scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp src -r downport && abaplint --fix abaplint_downport.json
scripts.unit: rm -rf output && abap_transpile && echo RUNNING && node output/index.js
scripts.rename: abaplint --rename && rm -rf src && cp -r renamed/src . && abaplint --fix
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run downport && npm run unit
